title: respect of the area to which the following Order relates, hereby order as follows:
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Rent Pressure Zone (Local Electoral Area
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Rent Pressure Zone (Local Electoral Area 

of Carrigaline) Order 2024.
text_norm: 1 order may cited rent pressure zone (local electoral area carrigaline) order 2024

title: respect of the area to which the following Order relates, hereby order as follows:
heading: 2. The Order comes into operation on 12 September 2024.
text_raw: 2. The Order comes into operation on 12 September 2024.

title: respect of the area to which the following Order relates, hereby order as follows:
heading: 3. The area consisting of the Local Electoral Area of Carrigaline is
text_raw:
3. The area consisting of the Local Electoral Area of Carrigaline is 
prescribed as a rent pressure zone during the period commencing on 12 
September 2024 and ending on 31 December 2024. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

11 September, 2024. 

DARRAGH O’BRIEN, 

Minister for Housing, Local Government and Heritage. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
"Iris Oifigiúil" of 13th September, 2024. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [456] 3
text_norm: 3 area consisting local electoral area carrigaline prescribed rent pressure zone period commencing 12 september 2024 ending 31 december 2024 given official seal 11 september 2024 darragh brien minister housing local government heritage notice making statutory instrument published iris oifigiuil 13th september 2024 456 3

title: respect of the area to which the following Order relates, hereby order as follows:
heading: (This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation) 

This Order provides for the designation of the Local Electoral Area of 
Carrigaline as a rent pressure zone under section 24A of the Residential 
Tenancies Act 2004 (as inserted by section 36 of the Planning and Development 
(Housing) and Residential Tenancies Act 2016), for the period commencing on 
12 September 2024 and ending on 31 December 2024. 

 
 
 
 
 
 4 [456]
